wikipedia_page.main: Robert James Byron, 13th Baron Byron (born 5 April 1950) is a British nobleman, peer, politician, and barrister. He is a descendant of a cousin of Romantic poet and writer George Gordon Byron, 6th Baron Byron.

link_mentions.page: List of barons in the peerages of Britain and Ireland
